details.description: Developed a user-friendly native Android App which served \textbf{20 B2B users}.
Reprogrammed the existing Restful API in PHP which ran on a low cost server resulting in \textbf{70\%} cost savings.
The app served as MVP for the company which led to further ideation of the product.
Built the portal in PHP from ground up which ran on a low cost server.
Frontend technologies involved CSS, JavaScript, jQuery and Bootstrap 3 helped with responsiveness.
